Title: Directs the commissioner of health to develop a mobile vaccination program for COVID-19 vaccinations
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to develop a mobile vaccination program for COVID-19 vaccinations with employers with more than 200 employees.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to directing the commissioner of health to develop a mobile vaccination program for COVID-19 vaccinations
